Arcane Strike: Imbue weapons with +4 magic damage bonus for 1 rd
Bomb: May create bombs that inflict full HP on hit and 6 HP (Ref half) splash 11/dy
Concussive Bomb: Bomb inflicts 5d4 sonic damage instead of fire and deafens on hit (Fort neg)
Delayed Bomb: May time bomb to explode after up to 10 rd
Feral Mutagen: Imbibing mutagen grants 2 claw attacks for 1d6 HP each, 1 bite attack for 1d8 HP damage, and +2 Intimidate
Swift Alchemy: May apply poison to a blade as a move action
Swift Poisoning: May apply poison to a blade as a swift action
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash

Absorbing Touch (Alchemist3 Tran): Self hand absorbs 10 lb object (DC 14 Fort neg) for 10 dy

Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2, B3
Intelligence Alchemist Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Extract1
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Alchemy: May identify potions as with Detect Magic at will/May infuse extracts that duplicate spell effects
Arcane Spell Failure: 20%
Bonded Object: Cast known spell through object
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Combine Extracts: May combine two effects into one extract
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Distraction: R30' Perform check vs. visual magic while performing
Dweomercraft: Bardic Performance gives allies +2 caster level checks, concentration, and spell attack
Enhance Potion: May cause imbibed potion to function at caster level 10 1/dy
Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
Expanded Repertoire: Has access to additional spells
Extended Performance: May expend spell slot to extend Bardic Performance effects
Fascinate: R90' Hold 4 creatures spellbound while performing (DC 18 Will neg)
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus Effects
Improved Counterspell: Counter using higher-level spell from same school
Inspire Competence: R30' Allies +3 skill checks while performing
Inspire Greatness: R30' 1 allies +2d10 HP, +2 attack, +1 Fortitude while performing
Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +2 AC and +4/-2 to strength/intelligence, dexterity/wisdom, or constitution/charisma for 100 min
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Spell Suppression: Bardic Performance acts as Dispel Magic
Suggestion: Suggestion to 1 fascinated creature (DC 18 Will neg)
Swift Alchemy: Creating alchemical items takes half normal time
Wand Mastery: Uses charisma bonus to calculate save DC of wands
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
